short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On a Trulia page this extension finds the address and creates a link that opens that address on Walkscore.com. Zillow coming soon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On a Trulia page this extension finds the address and creates a link that opens that address on Walkscore.com. Support for the Zillow site coming soon
